attributes.action: Increase the defense budget and reverse the illogical changes to the structure of the armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A call on the PM to reverse with immediate effect the amalgamation of historic regiments within the British Army into new "Super-Regiments". To significantly increase the commitment to the Navy and the RAF. And to increase the defense spending budget in order to bring it into line with the committments of our armed forces around the world.
